transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Good morning sir, Ashutosh baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha Ashutosh ji boliye.
Executive: Ji sir abhi actually ek call aayi hai aapki team ki taraf se customer care pe ye 419 number hai last mein jisme ye kiska number hai?
Customer: Wo hamare CEO sahab ka number hai, bataiye.
Executive: Achcha unhone customer care pe call kiya tha ki catalog wrongly updated hai is wajah se leads nahi aa rahi aur jo assistant manager hai wo call nahi respond kar rahe hain.
Customer: Ha exactly wo dono log call receive nahi kar rahe.
Executive: Achcha to mera number dena actually ye Prashant and Venkat ki baat kar rahe hain na?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Prashant aur Venkat ji ki baat kar rahe hain na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ha to wo actually aapki sales team se honge matlab jo hamare IndiaMART pe sales team hai jinhone aapko local mein sale kiya hoga unka number hoga wo matlab unpe call kiya hoga but waha se services move ho chuki hai na aur head office mein hi operate ho rahi hai to ab matlab unse lena dena hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir paisa lene ke paisa lene ke baad kuch update nahi hai Prashant ji. Main refundable ke liye baat kar raha hu, main refundable ke liye baat kar raha hu aap refundable karwa dijiye amount.
Executive: Sir to samasya to bataiye maine aapse kal baat kari thi maine bola tha ki ek ka issue aa raha hai.
Customer: Samasya chhod dijiye Prashant ji samasya chhod dijiye sorry Ashutosh ji aap kya kijiye na refundable ka process karwa dijiye.
Executive: Sir refund us case mein hota hai jahan pe aapko kuch miscommitment ki gayi ho ya kuch matlab service na mil rahi ho main available hu.
Customer: Main available nahi hu. Sir service service nahi mil rahi hai na sir aap kab ki open ki hui hai aap dekho.
Executive: 15 tarikh se.
Customer: 15 tarikh se kya service mili hai humko aapki taraf se humko kya service mili hui hai bataiye.
Executive: Meri taraf se ye service mili hui hai jab aapki service live hui maine aapko call kiya tha process bataya tha is tarike se use karna hai even ye bhi bola tha agar kuch challenge aaye to aap mujhe connect kar lena during that process uske baad mein aapki taraf se mere pass koi call ya message nahi aaya sir abhi jab maine khud dekha apni taraf se kal to maine aapko apni taraf se call kiya ki sir.
Customer: Sir aap apni taraf se nahi dekhiye you are getting the pressure from your head office main bhi pichle line mein business kar raha hu theek hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: You are getting pressure from your head office then you will call me sir aapko kuch issues aa rahi hai kya sir bolo mere ko aisa baat kar rahe hain aap.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir issue mujhe hame identify hota hai agar aap lead nahi pick kar rahe hain na to hame to identify hoga na ki sir lead nahi pick kar rahe hain kuch issue hoga aur higher hierarchy se hamare pass aisa koi ye nahi hota ki hame ek client ko mahine mein 10 bar call karna hai ek bar maine aapko call kiya tha uske baad follow up ke liye hame khud call karni padti aapki taraf se agar batao ki kahin pe kuch raise kiya gaya ho ya mujhe message tak aaya ho ya aapne mujhe mail dala ho ki Ashutosh mujhe ye issue aa raha hai even meri taraf se hi call aayi hai aapko aap batao ki call mili ki nahi mili aapko uske baad bhi maine aapse bahut jyada time nahi manga hai maine aapse sirf aaj ka time manga ki aaj pura din aap ladke ko bitha lo agar aap chahte hain to ghante do ghante main sath mein google meet pe baith jata hu proper research karte hain sab kuch dekhte hain matlab solution problem jo bhi hai na uska solution dene ko main ready hu.
Customer: Nahi nahi dekhiye Ashutosh ji wo mere ko nahi hona kuch bhi jo aap bol rahe hain abhi kya hai mere CEO sahab se baat hua unhone kya bole ki aap unko bolo mere ko I need the refundable.
Executive: Sir dekhiye matlab bina discussion ke to aage main.
Customer: Kya hai? Sir dekhiye matlab ye band band karne ka solution dekho band karna solution nahi hai aapne paisa isiliye lagaya hoga na.
Executive: This is the solution I will do from another one no issue main kahin aur se bhi karwa sakta hu.
Customer: Sir achchi baat hai lekin wo fir wahi utna hi time waste hoga na ek hi din ka to main aapse time mang raha hu na ek din ka aap mujhe time de do aap banda jo bhi banda handle kar raha hai na.
Customer: Ashutosh ji you have today till today time do whatever you want just do it.
Executive: Aap aap mujhe jo bata rahe hain.
Customer: Ashutosh ji let me finish my word.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Do whatever you want just do it I need the solution by today end of the day by tomorrow if anything will be else I will go for the legal and I will what what I will do I cannot tell you really.
Executive: Do one thing just give me a contact number of your team who is taking care of IndiaMART I will connect to.
Customer: I am taking care of IndiaMART just let me know what I have to do just connect on Google Meet let's connect on Google Meet and sit together and discuss about the leads send me the link send me the link I will connect with the Google Meet.
Executive: Wait a wait a second.
Customer: You have my mail ID?
Executive: Yes I have your email ID.
Customer: Which mail ID you have?
Executive: Just let me know let me check first this one.
Executive: Enquiry@titan.in.
Customer: Write my mail ID hadi@irannestable.com.
Executive: Just allow me a moment sir.
Executive: Could you please repeat it sir?
Customer: Hadi.
Executive: Please spell out sir.
Customer: Hadi h a d i @ of h a d i right d for ball.
Executive: Yes h a d i.
Customer: H h a d i better better I will send you message send me hi message on whatsapp.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: In same number.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes yes allow me a moment sir.
Executive: Just now to screen.
Customer: Aap hi register aur Abdul Wali sir.
Customer: 3650.
Customer: Ha unko boliye I will let you know please share me the pin code.
Customer: Right.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Allow me a moment sir just be on call sir. Yes I have texted you I have sent you a message over the whatsapp.
Customer: Yes one second. Please check your whatsapp.
Customer: Yeah share my mail ID send me the link and after that I will join okay now?
Executive: Yeah fine I'm just sending it.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: So what you will do in the Google meeting?
Executive: We will sit together and observe the leads whatever the leads are coming and let's see if any lead you are missing out because right now we will sit together and see whatever the lead flow is there how many leads are coming during that time and how many leads we are able to consume.
Customer: Okay. Because we have already seen that there are no let me know first what is the process right now for the IndiaMART.
Executive: The process is how the leads will be work.
Executive: Basically if any buyer is coming on the portal he he will post the lead and that lead will be visible to you that's it.
Customer: Okay so how much time it will take for the lead expert?
Executive: No there is no timeline I'll allocate my time and you have to allocate your time.
Customer: Ashutosh ji Ashutosh ji yesterday I have discussed with you you are saying that only 10 to 15 seconds the leads will be there system will be changed I am saying another word I have all the call recording please let me complete my word please let me yes yes please yes yes please I I told yesterday I told you 10 to 15 second to refresh the page every 10 to 15 second you have to refresh the page there is no timeline for the lead.
Customer: Then why should the lead will be expired from my website from my portal let me come.
Executive: Yes let me tell you if a buyer is posting a lead and that lead has been consumed by any any of the five suppliers available on IndiaMART and during that time you are not available on the portal that lead will be expired.
Customer: So you have to be among those five suppliers to take that lead.
Customer: Okay I am accepting that thing the main thing if I will go with IndiaMART continuously so for example one or two leads at least one lead I can get it now at least think one at least one lead I can get it but till now I'm not getting any lead why?
Executive: Sir sir if you are active you can get all the lead available on the portal or you can without all the lead.
Customer: Brother we are always active in that IndiaMART in the online portal we are working with just going very smoothly there is no complaint about this.
Executive: That is what I am telling you if you are if you are able to give some time to IndiaMART na just for the today I will show you that if you are how much IndiaMART get time let me know one year two years 10 years how much you require the time.
Customer: You will see the result there is no issue there is no issue I will give you the time.
Executive: Then come to the join Google Meet and let's discuss here okay.
Customer: Yeah give me 10 minutes to 15 minutes I will join Google meeting okay.
Executive: All right just drop me a message over the whatsapp then you are available I have already shared the link sure sure sir sure sure no issue I will do it that.
Executive: All right yeah thank you so much. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Catalog wrongly updated, leads not coming.

- Assistant manager not responding to calls.

- Wants a refund for the subscription.

- Not getting any leads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained refund policy.

- Executive offered to join a Google Meet.

- Agreed to connect on Google Meet to resolve issue.

- Executive shared email ID over WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join Google Meet in 10-15 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, google meet, subscription
